page.title: 11POLITICS-LOCAL & NATIONAL
page.content: The area surveyed is of recent political creation ,when under local government re-orginisation in 1975 , the parliamentary constituency of Eastwood was created ,the safest conservative seat in Scotland .Eastwood district council is of the same political persuasion ,with 12 members of whom 10 are tory and 2 independent . The main residential areas are populated by the most affluent society of Glasgow's surburbia ,well educated ,professional and articulate .Even the local council housing area of Woodfarm has 26% home ownership and a high level of amenity .Thus spurred by a deserved pride in their area ,such groups as Giffnocks residents association and Giffnock and Thornliebank communinity council are well attended .
